articles.title: SEVENTEEN Announces Additional Dates And Cities For 2022 World Tour “BE THE SUN” - soompi
articles.description: SEVENTEEN has confirmed additional dates and cities for their Asian tour! The day after completing their North American tour and the initial last stop for their Asian tour in Singapore on October 13, SEVENTEEN gave a pleasant surprise to their fans by releasi…

articles.author: Moki Edwin Kindzeka
articles.title: Cameroon: Armed Separatists Prevent Health Workers From Assisting Monkeypox Patients - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: Heath officials say they have confirmed a monkeypox outbreak in the town of Mbonge on the western border with Nigeria
articles.content: Yaounde, Cameroon  A monkeypox outbreak has been confirmed in the town of Mbonge, health authorities in Cameroon say, but armed separatists are preventing workers from investigating suspected cases.… [+3371 chars]

articles.title: China’s top chip equipment maker asks American staff to step aside - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Beijing-based Naura Technology has asked its US engineers to stop working on R&D projects with immediate effect, after Washington restricted the involvement of US citizens in certain areas of chip development in China.
